Definition: Given a comment text in Tamil, classify the comment into one of these categories (i) Hope speech, if it contains encouraging, positive or supportive contents about equality, diversity or inclusion, (ii) Not Hope Speech or (iii) Not in Expected Language, if the text is not Tamil.

Positive Examples.explanation: The given text contains content that is encouraging, positive or supportive contents and talks about equality, diversity or inclusion and is in expected language - tamil

Positive Examples.input: appo china kitta irukkiradhu sivappu panama.
Positive Examples.explanation: The given text does not contain content that is neither encouraging, positive and supportive contents nor talks about equality, diversity and inclusion although it is in expected language - tamil

Positive Examples.input: தரமான கருத்து bronnஉளவு பார்க்கும் app மட்டும் நீக்க வேண்டும்.nnஆரம் Media Tamil
Positive Examples.explanation: The given text contains content that is encouraging, positive or supportive contents and talks about equality, diversity or inclusion and is in expected language - tamil
The given text is not in expected language - tamil

Negative Examples.input: இஸ்லாம் மார்க்கத்தில் உணவில் ஹலால் ஹராம் பற்றி குர்ஆனிலும்  ஸுன்னாவிலும் கூறப்பட்டுள்ளது...
Negative Examples.explanation: The given text does not contain content that is neither encouraging, positive and supportive contents nor talks about equality, diversity and inclusion although it is in expected language. So it is wrongly classified as Hope Speech

Negative Examples.input: Thaaivaaa neenga sonnathu Tiktok we hats offf
Negative Examples.explanation: The given text is in expected language - tamil but it is wrongly classified as Not in Expected Language
